short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you receive RSS updates on your email

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As you already guess feedamail.com is simple but very powerfull tool that deliver Atom or RSS feeds to e-mail. It is very convenient to get fresh news from your favourite sites or blogs that you constantly visit. 

This extension will detect feeds on pages you visit and allows to subscribe them simply.
